name: Chemical X
description:
My three modifications were three unique levels with their own obstacles, layout, and challenges. I tried to create a level progression from easy to more difficult. 

I added in a few blood splatter sprites to create a spookier theme I was aiming for. 

I altered the UI to reflect my games title, and added in the instructions/lore to the game's main menu. 

Struggled a lot with trying to create a script for explosives that shot how I desired. 

Blood splatter sprite credits: PWL on https://opengameart.org/content/blood-splats
